attributes.action: A vote of no confidence in PM Mr Cameron after his shares in the Panama scandal.
attributes.additional_details: David Cameron sold his stake in the Blairmore fund for more than £30,000 in January 2010.
attributes.background: David Cameron has admitted on 7th April 2016 that he profited in his father's offshore funds in Panama just four months before becoming Prime Minister in 2010. I believe there should be a vote of no confidence because of how this was hidden from the public domain.
